name: Halyx
description:
HALYX

This game was made in 72h for the WOWIE JAM 2.0 with the topic of "intentional bugs".

I took the famous Half-Life 2 glitch called "prop flying" and made it the main mechanic of my game. It has a small mix of puzzle solving and 3d platforming.

https://i.imgur.com/QLawDF9.mp4 - for those who don't know how the glitch works

This is my first 3D game and also I didn't use any external plugins/scripts/assets outside of FMOD and wall/ceiling texture.

Hope you have fun playing it and if anything seems off to you, im open to feedback in the comments!
